name: Investigate High Risk Typo Squatting Domain Response
description: Investigate High Risk Typo Squatting Domain Response

resource.content:
- Request to block indicators is  Approved

- Proceeding with block procedure

steps.name: Analyst Confirm for Domain Typo Squatting

schema.title: Confirm Domain Typo Squatting
schema.description: IP Address is not resolved for the Potentially Squatting domain and hence **"{{vars.alertSourceData.similar_domain}}"**is Typo Squatting Domain.

schema.title: Approval - Block Malicious Indicators
schema.description: Please approve blocking of squatting domain indicator "{{vars.alertSourceData['similar_domain']}}"

message.content:
Monitored Domain and Potentially Squatting Domain are owned by the same company "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Whois_Lookup.data['registrant_contact'].company}}".

 

Closed Alert as False Positive

resource.closureNotes: Monitored Domain and Potentially Squatting Domain are owned by the same company "**{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Whois_Lookup.data['registrant_contact'].company}}**".

message.content:
{% if vars.steps.Resolved_Potentially_Squatting_Domain_Name.data.dnsRecords | length %}

Malicious certificate and website brand found, for the Potentially Squatting domain and hence {{vars.alertSourceData.similar_domain}} is Typo Squatting Domain

{% else %}

IP Address is not resolved for the Potentially Squatting domain and hence {{vars.alertSourceData.similar_domain}} is Typo Squatting Domain

{% endif %}

Closed Alert as True Positive

resource.closureNotes:
{% if vars.steps.Resolved_Potentially_Squatting_Domain_Name.data.dnsRecords | length %}

Malicious certificate and website brand found, for the Potentially Squatting domain and hence {{vars.alertSourceData.similar_domain}} is Typo Squatting Domain

{% else %}

IP Address is not resolved for the Potentially Squatting domain and hence {{vars.alertSourceData.similar_domain}} is Typo Squatting Domain

{% endif %}

steps.name: Compare Monitor and Potentially Squatting Domain

params.data:
[{"Name": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.names[0]}}",
"Labels": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.labels | join(',')}}",
"Issuer DN": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.parsed.issuer_dn}}",
"Subject DN": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.parsed.subject_dn}}",
"Validation Level": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.validation_level}}",
"NSS Validation": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.validation.nss.is_valid}}",
"Apple Validation": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.validation.apple.is_valid}}",
"Chrome Validation": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.validation.chrome.is_valid}}",
"Microsoft Validation": "{{vars.steps.Get_Domain_Certificate.data.result.validation.microsoft.is_valid}}"}]

steps.name: Create Monitored Domain Whois HTML Table

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

steps.name: Create Potentially Squatting Whois HTML Table

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

steps.name: Create Task for Takedown Request
steps.description: Create a manual task to raise typo domain takedown request

message.content: "{{vars.alertSourceData.similar_domain}}" domain is found as a Typo Squatting Domain. Hence, initiating takedown request by creating the Task #{{vars.result.id}} - {{vars.result.name}}

resource.name: Raise Takedown Request - {{vars.alertSourceData['similar_domain']}}
resource.priority: {% if vars.input.records[0].severity.itemValue == 'Critical' %}{{"TaskPriority" | picklist("Urgent", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"TaskPriority" | picklist("High", "@id")}}{% endif %}

steps.name: Create Whois Compared Data HTML Table

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

resource.content:
Similarity between Monitored Domain Vs Potentially Squatting Domain
